name: My Foal 3D
synopsis: Your own foal in 3D! Up to 20 cute foals are waiting to have fun and be looked after by you. Fall in love with their adorable expressions as they come right up to you in 3D! •Over 25 breeds you can choose from •Use the microphone and call your foal for attention. •Comprehensive story mode included with integrated photo album! •Augmented Reality: Using the AR card you can have your own cute foal right in your hand! •StreetPass™: Hold beauty contests and win cool in-game extras!
